ygData.msgSnippet: Thr Crits in rolemaster were a hoot.  My favorite was the crushing crit head pulped and splatterd over a wide area  I had this happen to one of my characters
ygData.messageBody:
Thr Crits in rolemaster were a hoot. My favorite was the crushing crit
"head pulped and splatterd over a wide area" I had this happen to one of my
characters when he fell out of a tree, lol.

> numbers.
